messages.subject: Re Son's praying for Daddy
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I thought of something when I was reading your post.  Maybe it would be fun to have a homeschooling trip to Daddy s work, so SOn & others can see what
messages.messageBody: Hi, I thought of something when I was reading your post.  Maybe it would be fun to have a homeschooling trip to Daddy's work, so SOn & others can see what Daddy does. The office, and how important Daddy's work is, and all the ways his job helps people. Maybe if he saw where he was everyday he could relate to his job a little better.  Son could give Daddy a special object that he can carry around with him when he is at work, perhaps.  And all prayers are great.  AN expression of ones hopes, and concerns, some days I may pray , and include some worrisome thoughts, but they will pass.  But that is a high stress job, maybe focusing on the activities that aren't so scary.  My husband climbs trees, and at times this can be a hazard, but few people can do this type of job, and Daddy loves it.  SO we try to have fun with it.   Michelle
